'''bartham''' is a [[Mithrimin]] word meaning "dwelling house".
==Etymology==
It was adapted from [[Quenya]] ''[[martan]]'' pl. ''martami''.<ref>{{PE|17}}, p.109</ref>
==Cognates==
*[[Quenya]] ''[[martan]]''
*[[Sindarin]] ''[[barthan]]''
